properties.body:
BAY OF BISCAY.
FRANCE.
DNC 08.
12 METER VESSEL MAWI, DISABLED AND
ADRIFT DUE TO ENGINE FAILURE IN 46-12.85N 002-53.39W.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC ETEL, TELEX: 42950519,
PHONE: 332 9755 3535, FAX: 332 9755 4934,
E-MAIL: ETEL@MRCCFR.EU.
